Rule.Name: IndicatorsNotExported
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Indicator associations, attributes, and groups will not be exported

Rule.Name: RespBindingNotExported
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Responsibility bindings in stub will not be exported

Rule.Name: SubActorsAsMetadata
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Associations to children actor references will be converted to metadata

Rule.Name: AspectStubsAsStubs
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Aspect-related stub will be converted to stub with metadata

Rule.Name: AnythingAsEmptyPoint
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Anything path node will be converted to empty point with metadata

Rule.Name: FailurePointAsEmptyPoint
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Failure point will be converted to empty point with metadata

Rule.Name: FailureSPasSP
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Failure start point will be converted to start point with metadata

Rule.Name: OtherCompAsTeam
Rule.Description: Z.151 Export: Component of kind Other will be converted to Team with metadata

Rule.Name: DeprecatedOrientation
Rule.Description: Deprecated: The "orientation" attribute should no longer be used in forks/joins

Rule.Name: DeprecatedTransaction
Rule.Description: Deprecated: The "transaction" attribute should no longer be used in plug-in bindings

Rule.Name: DeprecatedPointcut
Rule.Description: Deprecated: The "pointcut" attribute should no longer be used in stubs. Use "aopointcut" instead.

Rule.Name: DeprecatedPriority
Rule.Description: Deprecated: The "priority" attribute should no longer be used in intentional elements. Use "importance" instead.

Rule.Name: DeprecatedCriticality
Rule.Description: Deprecated: The "criticality" attribute should no longer be used in intentional elements. Use "importance" instead.
